title: CustomScrollView
description: CustomScrollView allows creating a scrollable area with multiple slivers such as SliverAppBar, SliverList, and SliverGrid.

title: APPbar
description: AppBar is a material design app bar that consists of a toolbar and potentially other widgets, such as a TabBar and a FlexibleSpaceBar.

title: TabBar
description: TabBar is used to create navigation tabs.

title: TextField
description: TextField is used to create text input fields.

title: ListView
description: ListView is used to display a list of items in a scrollable view.
